newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: Ivory cocoa product exports little changed in July.
newsitem.headline: Ivory cocoa product exports little changed in July.

text.p: Ivory Coast exported 5,805 tonnes of semi-finished cocoa products in July against 5,883 tonnes in June, official data show.
Exports in July 1995 amounted to 4,404 tonnes.
Cumulative exports in the first 10 months of the 1995/96 (Oct-Sept) season were 51,063 tonnes against 42,213 tonnes in the same period of 1994/95.
The data do not separate liquor, butter and cake exports but they show additional shipments of 373 tonnes of powder.
Cumulative powder shipments stand at 4,276 tonnes this season against 63 tonnes last year. --David Gault, Abidjan Newsroom +225 21 90 90
